long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search organizer is a Chrome extension that improves your search experience by clustering similar results together.

Are you doing deep research on a topic and want a good way to look through many results?
Are you tired of seeing the exact same article copied and pasted on the search engine front page?
Do you want to get better "table of contents" of what the internet thinks of a topic?

You need Search Organizer!

After installing the chrome extension on either Bing (free version) or Google (paid version), you will see the top results replaced with *clusters of results*. Search Organizer fetches 70-150 results and clusters similar ones together. The top result in each cluster is displayed. Click the show button to see the additional results of the cluster underneath. In addition there is a table of contents on the right hand side pointing out the most defining phrases and words of each cluster.
